data.title: Weather Forecast
data.notes: Fetch current conditions and daily/hourly forecasts from Open-Meteo.

params.title: Postal Code
params.caption: Optional postal/ZIP code for geolocation (overrides latitude/longitude).

params.title: Latitude
params.caption: Enter the latitude as a decimal number (ignored if using postal code).

params.title: Longitude
params.caption: Enter the longitude as a decimal number (ignored if using postal code).

params.title: Temperature Unit
params.caption: Choose the temperature unit returned by the API.

params.title: Windspeed Unit
params.caption: Choose the windspeed unit returned by the API.

params.title: Precipitation Unit
params.caption: Choose the precipitation unit returned by the API.

params.title: Forecast Days
params.caption: Optional number of days to return in the forecast.

params.title: Forecast Hours
params.caption: Number of hourly entries to return (defaults to 24).

params.title: Timeout (ms)
params.caption: Number of milliseconds to wait for the API response.

params.title: Include Air Quality
params.caption: Include current air quality data from Open-Meteo.
